{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <DESCRIPTION>Bey Hrn. Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind folgende Bccher zu verkauffen:</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Frischens Harpfen Davids</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 2. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stchelins</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Predigten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>48. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Sammlung auserlesener Cantzel-Reden</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>Erster Theil</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>56. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Bonds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Satyrische Gedichte</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Bonds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Brieffe</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>9. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Tempe Helveticg</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 6.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Alardins</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Geistlicher Thee-Brauch</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>4. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Nachricht von Joh. Bossarten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>heilige Reden</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>1ter Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fischers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anmerckungen</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>6. Stuck complet</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Brachmann</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>complet</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <DESCRIPTION>alle in albho. Ferner, gebunden:</DESCRIPTION>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fabri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>9. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Scriptores-Helv.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>3. Pfund 10. c.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Simlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Regiment der Eydgnocschafft</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>1. Pfund 17. c.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Valer. Mar- Amst.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>18. c.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Nov. Testam. Graec.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Homen Hias & Odyfl.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>12. 2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Judas der Ertzschelm</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>4. Pf.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"Added XML declaration, corrected the encoding, fixed the closing tag for PRIZE to be consistent, added a DESCRIPTION tag for the introductory text, and ensured all special characters are properly encoded."}
